SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into world_peace (`name`, birth, is_die, is_delete, creat_time, update_time, delete_time) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isDie,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update world_peace set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birth = #{birth,jdbcType=DATE}, is_die = #{isDie,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, birth, is_die, is_delete, creat_time, update_time, delete_time from world_peace
